execution_quality: Not applicable—no agent work was performed. The user ran a command directly in their shell and shared the output.
work_category: The user executed a bash command (doom sync) to synchronize their Doom Emacs configuration. The agent took no action—it received the bash input and output from the user's terminal execution.
summary: This was a bash command execution (doom sync) initiated by the user directly in their terminal, not a Claude Code task. No agent work was performed. The user shared the command output, which was still running when the message was sent.
follow_up_pattern: The user shared command output mid-execution (output was truncated). This appears to be either accidental message submission or a check-in during a long-running process. No follow-up action is expected unless there's an error.
